MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK7 postcode area of Stirling. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:38am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and have identified a fault on the underground cable network that require our specialist team to attend site to assist with the repairs affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:19 AM on Monday, 08 February 2021.
